statements: UPDATE festival_tickets SET ticket_price = 150.00, revenue = 12000.50 WHERE festival_id = 'f1b2234c-cc1c-4d6b-8d71-907ad4ca0e1a';
UPDATE festival_tickets SET tickets_sold = 500, attendance = 600 WHERE festival_name = 'Music Fest';
UPDATE festival_tickets SET tickets_sold = tickets_sold + 100, revenue = revenue + (ticket_price * 100) WHERE festival_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE festival_tickets SET ticket_price = 150.00, attendance = 500 WHERE festival_id = '65432100-12a3-4b56-789c-d98765432101';
UPDATE festival_tickets SET ticket_price = 150.00, ticket_quantity = 500 WHERE festival_name = 'Summer Fest';
UPDATE festival_attendance SET total_attendees = 1000, revenue = 20000.00 WHERE attendance_id = 4;
UPDATE festival_tickets SET ticket_price = 150.75, ticket_quantity = ticket_quantity - 1 WHERE ticket_id = 101
UPDATE festival_attendance SET revenue = revenue + 5000.00, total_attendees = total_attendees + 50 WHERE attendance_id = 201
UPDATE ticket_sales SET ticket_price = 25.00, ticket_quantity = 50 WHERE ticket_id = 123;
UPDATE festivals SET total_revenue = 7500.00, total_attendance = 3000 WHERE festival_id = 456;

UPDATE festivals SET location = 'New York', total_attendance = total_attendance + 50 WHERE festival_id = 2;
